resources.string: Hello there! This is Greater Chennai Corporation\'s official CORONA MONITORING APP
Please enter the OTP that you\'ve received
Gems will be credited within 24 Hours
Unable to get your location at the moment. Please try again later.
Please enter the correct mobile number
Please use your credentials to login
Please check whether you have entered all the details correctly
The username you entered has already been taken. Please type in a different username.
We need access to all the permissions in order to capture the image and upload it to our servers to serve you better.

It seems you have disabled the required permissions permanently. The app will not work without those permissions. If you would like to grant the permissions, click on \'OK\' and grant all permissions. If you wish not to, the app will shutdown itself.
Please turn OFF mock location to continue using the app
We will send you a One Time Password to this number
1. This application is the property of Greater Chennai Corporation

This Application is developed to handle crisis situations created due to the CORONA outbreak. The data collected through this application will not be used for any other purpose unless authorized by law. Further, the data collected will be completely deleted in 3 months.

You must access and use our Services only for legal, authorized, and acceptable purposes. You will not use (or assist others in using) our Services in ways that: (a) violate, misappropriate, or infringe the rights of citizens, our users, or others, including privacy, publicity, intellectual property, or other proprietary rights; (b) are illegal, obscene, defamatory, threatening, intimidating, harassing, hateful, racially, or ethnically offensive, or instigate or encourage conduct that would be illegal, or otherwise inappropriate, including promoting violent crimes; Â© involve publishing falsehoods, misrepresentations, or misleading statements; (d) impersonate someone; (e) involve sending illegal or impermissible communications such as bulk messaging, auto-messaging, auto-dialing, and the like; or (f) involve any non-personal use of our Services unless otherwise authorized by us.
You are responsible for keeping your device and your account safe and secure, and you must notify us promptly of any unauthorized use or security breach of your account or our Services.
I agree to the Terms and Conditions as stated above
Please check the checkbox in order to continue.
The idea was conceptualized by M.P. Azhagu Pandia Raja, Research Fellow with Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs and Greater Chennai Corporation.

This application and infrastructure were designed and developed by a team of engineers at Mr. Cooper, Chennai. Mr. Cooper is an industry-leading mortgage services provider serving customers through servicing, originations, and digital real estate solutions. They are headquartered in Dallas, TX, with major outposts in Irvine, Chandler, Longview, Highlands Ranch, Chennai, and Bengaluru.

Tech for Cities is an effort under the Chennai Tricolor Initiative Trust - a non-profit, volunteer run organization. Tech for Cities works with Governments and Non-profits to build collaborative opensource solutions that help maximise impact. More details about Chennai Tricolor Initiative at www.chennaitricolor.in

This application was developed to aid in cluster analysis and reporting of incidents related to CORONA outbreak. This application will be used by Greater Chennai Corporation for CORONA mitigation measures. Geo tagging of information is the primary purpose of the application. The information collected will not be used for any other purpose. This application can be uninstalled once the COVID-19 issue gets resolved.
